name: 🦁 LR VIRAL CONTENT PIPELINE - ULTIMATE 150+ NODE SYSTEM - PRODUCTION READY

parameters.name: messages
parameters.value:
={{ JSON.stringify([{"role": "system", "content": "Du bist der ultimative Trend-Scanner für virale Social Media Inhalte. Fokus auf Lifestyle, Freiheit, Online-Business, ASMR, 3D-AR, Lion-Reminiscence, Meme-Mascots."}, {"role": "user", "content": "ULTIMATE VIRAL TREND RESEARCH 2025 (letzten 72h):

🔥 VIRAL PATTERNS:
- ASMR/VSMR Growth (binaural, -20 LUFS)
- 3D/AR Hologram Illusions
- Animal Cameos (Löwe als Reflex/Schatten/Auge)
- Glass/Crystal Aesthetics
- Impossible Physics Moments
- Baby Shark/Despacito Pattern (Repetition/Humor/Emotion/Novelty)

🎯 ZIELGRUPPEN:
- Lifestyle/Luxury Seekers
- Financial Freedom Aspirants
- Tech/AI Early Adopters
- German Premium Market

📊 ANALYSIERE:
1. Top 10 virale Trends (DE/Global)
2. Engagement-Patterns
3. Audio-Trends (ASMR/Binaural)
4. Visual-Trends (3D/Glass/Animal)
5. Hook-Formeln (POV/Impossible/FOMO)

Return with citations and viral scores!"}]) }}

parameters.name: q
parameters.value: viral social media trends luxury lifestyle

parameters.name: messages
parameters.value:
={{ JSON.stringify([{"role": "user", "content": "ULTIMATE LR VIRAL CONTENT CREATION SYSTEM

Trend Data: " + JSON.stringify($json.trends.slice(0, 5)) + "

Erstelle 10-20 VIRAL STORY-ARCS (3-Beat Structure):

🦁 ANIMAL LANE (LÖWE):
- Beat 1: Impossible micro-moment (≤2s)
- Beat 2: Lion Cameo (Reflex/Schatten/Auge)
- Beat 3: CTA mit Humor

🔮 PORTAL/HOLOGRAM LANE:
- Beat 1: Crack→light leak
- Beat 2: Crystal ring→silhouette
- Beat 3: Logo etch reveal

🎭 AVATAR DIALOGE (Lina↔️Löwe↔️Matze):
- 60-120s: LR prägnant erklären
- Witziger Schlagabtausch
- CTA für Lina AI Chat

📱 VIRAL HOOKS (pro Arc 3 Varianten):
- POV: "Nicht drücken!" → Löwe drückt
- Impossible: Wasser fließt nach oben
- Humor: Baby Shark Pattern für LR
- FOMO: "Nur noch 24h verfügbar"
- Social Proof: "10.000+ nutzen bereits"

🎵 ASMR/VSMR INTEGRATION:
- Binaural bed @432 Hz / -20 LUFS
- Glas/Wind-Texturen
- Löwe-Whisper (Motivation)

🎨 VISUAL PROMPTS:
- Runway Gen-4: hyperreal luxury black/gold glass
- FLUX: Ultra-realistic crystal/glass, volumetric
- Tripo3D: 3D aus Bild für WebAR

Format als COMPLETE JSON mit:
- story_arcs[] (10-20 Arcs)
- hooks[] (3 pro Arc)
- runway_prompts[]
- flux_prompts[]
- avatar_scripts[]
- asmr_concepts[]
- viral_patterns[]

ALLE INHALTE BRAND-SAFE, KEINE IP-VERLETZUNG, COMPLIANCE-KONFORM!"}]) }}

parameters.name: messages
parameters.value:
={{ JSON.stringify([{"role": "system", "content": "Du bist Creative R&D Spezialist für virale Wellen und WOW-Innovationen."}, {"role": "user", "content": "CREATIVE R&D PHASE - Scanne aktuelle Viral-Wellen:

🔥 FOCUS AREAS:
- ASMR-Growth (neue Techniken 2025)
- 3D-AR ohne VR-Brille
- Lion-Reminiscence (Nostalgie + Power)
- Meme-Mascots (wiederkehrende Charaktere)
- Immersive Story-Räume
- Multi-API Cinematic Fusion
- Impossible Physics Trends

📊 ANALYSIERE:
1. Top 5 WOW-Innovationen (letzte 30 Tage)
2. Technische Umsetzbarkeit (Aug 2025)
3. Viral-Potential (1-100)
4. Brand-Safety Score
5. Implementation-Complexity

🎯 SCHLAGE VOR:
Top-5 Erweiterungen die SOFORT implementierbar sind mit:
- Fal.ai APIs (FLUX, Tripo3D, Marey, EchoMimic)
- Runway Gen-4.2
- ElevenLabs Turbo v2.6
- HeyGen Avatar IV

Return mit konkreten Umsetzungsschritten!"}]) }}

parameters.name: messages
parameters.value:
={{ JSON.stringify([{"role": "user", "content": "CLAUDE TOP-5 WOW-ERWEITERUNGEN IMPLEMENTIERUNG

Creative R&D Input: " + JSON.stringify($json) + "

Wähle TOP-3 Innovationen aus und erstelle SOFORT implementierbare Node-Konzepte:

🎬 VERFÜGBARE APIS (Aug 2025):
- Fal.ai: FLUX Dev 12B, Kling v2.1, Tripo3D v2.5, Stable Avatar, Marey i2v/t2v, EchoMimic V3, Bytedance Video-Stylize
- Runway: Gen-4.2 (camera/light controls)
- ElevenLabs: Turbo v2.6 (EVI 3 cloning, bilingual)
- HeyGen: Avatar IV (motion studio, 3d_mode, micro-expressions)

🔧 IMPLEMENTIERE:
1. **Immersive Story-Räume**: Fal.ai Marey + 3D-Depth + WebAR-QR
2. **Multi-API Cinematic Fusion**: Runway + Stable Avatar + EchoMimic + FLUX
3. **Impossible Physics**: Marey Pose Transfer + ASMR Sound-Design

📋 FORMAT ALS:
```json
{
  "selected_innovations": [
    {
      "name": "Innovation Name",
      "viral_score": 95,
      "implementation": {
        "nodes_required": 8,
        "apis_used": ["fal.ai", "runway"],
        "prompts": ["specific prompts"],
        "technical_steps": ["step 1", "step 2"]
      }
    }
  ]
}
```

ALLE BRAND-SAFE, RECHTLICH SAUBER, KEINE IP-VERLETZUNG!"}]) }}

parameters.jsonBody:
{
  "image_url": "{{ $json.flux_image_url }}",
  "prompt": "Water flows upward defying gravity, crystal glass splits backwards and self-heals, impossible physics demonstration, hyperreal luxury black gold, 9:16 aspect ratio",
  "duration": 10,
  "fps": 24,
  "aspect_ratio": "9:16"
}

{
  "prompt": "Recurring crystal lion mascot character, consistent design, luxury black gold glass aesthetic, friendly but powerful expression, meme-worthy pose, social media mascot style, hyperreal 4K",
  "image_size": "square_hd",
  "num_inference_steps": 28,
  "guidance_scale": 3.5,
  "num_images": 3,
  "enable_safety_checker": true
}

{
  "text": "Leichtes Flüstern, Glas-Ambience. Hey, ich bin Lina. Keine Panik – ich helfe dir Schritt für Schritt. Hör mal... Crystal-Löwe flüstert: Du schaffst das. Entspann dich.",
  "model_id": "eleven_turbo_v2_5",
  "voice_settings": {
    "stability": 0.5,
    "similarity_boost": 0.7,
    "style": 0.3,
    "use_speaker_boost": true
  },
  "pronunciation_dictionary_locators": [],
  "seed": 432,
  "previous_text": "",
  "next_text": "",
  "previous_request_ids": [],
  "next_request_ids": []
}

{
  "prompt": "Open crystal portal; crack → light leak → crystal ring → silhouette shadow only → logo etch; parallax layers; volumetric beams; luxury black gold glass lab; hyperreal 4K; caustics lighting; depth of field",
  "image_size": "portrait_4_3",
  "num_inference_steps": 28,
  "guidance_scale": 3.5,
  "num_images": 2,
  "enable_safety_checker": true
}

parameters.jsCode: return [{ ...$input.first().json, final_status: 'completed', timestamp: new Date().toISOString() }];
